data.name: The hardest game in the universe
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever wondered, what is the most difficult game in the universe



Why are you getting to know one of the most difficult games in the universe, Embark on this challenge with the new casual game, platform that aims to become one of the games most hated for its difficulty,


With a more challenging simple mechanic, you will have the agility to make the jumps at the right moments !!




Play everywhere, try your luck now in the mobile version of the hardest game in this universe, try your luck now and finish this challenge that not even the strongest will be able to


https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.oldguardgames.superdouglinhas


Are you ready for this big challenge, or are you just a coward??

data.short_description: Why are you getting to know one of the most difficult games in the universe, Embark on this challenge with the new casual game, platform that aims to become one of the games most hated for its difficulty,

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: intel celeron cpu 847 2.10ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel hd graphics family
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 8.1
  • Processor: intel celeron cpu 847 2.10ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel hd graphics family
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
